Tissue box with a built-in dispenser: This tissue box design would have a small compartment at the bottom that holds tissues and a dispenser mechanism that pushes them out when needed. This design would eliminate the need to manually pull tissues out of the box, making it more convenient to use.

Tissue box with a touch-free mechanism: This tissue box would have a sensor that detects when someone is near and automatically dispenses a tissue. This design would eliminate the need to touch the tissue box, making it more hygienic to use.

Tissue box with a built-in humidifier: This tissue box would have a built-in humidifier that releases a gentle mist of water into the air, helping to alleviate dryness and irritation in the nose and throat. This design would be especially useful during cold and flu season.

Tissue box with a built-in air freshener: This tissue box would have a built-in air freshener that releases a pleasant scent into the air, helping to eliminate odors and freshen up the environment. This design would be especially useful in public restrooms and other high-traffic areas.

Tissue box with a built-in hand sanitizer dispenser: This tissue box would have a built-in hand sanitizer dispenser that releases a small amount of hand sanitizer onto the tissue when it is dispensed. This design would help to promote good hygiene and prevent the spread of germs.
